title: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
overview: When the intimidating Rintaro meets the open-minded Kaoruko, the unlikely duo grows closer. The issue? Their neighboring high schools hate each other.

tv.showTitle: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
tv.episodeOverview: Noticing Rintaro's strange behavior, Shohei, Saku and Ayato follow him after school and try to eavesdrop on his meeting with Kaoruko and Subaru.
